name: Neon Trap Defense
description:
Prepare your defenses! in this tower defense without towers you are given some traps to deal with the colorful but soulless enemies that want to destroy your base

D:<

Made in a week for the LibGDX June Jam (2020) :3

Theme: Tower defense without towers 0_o

D:<

  • Don't block the path or your traps will disappear!!!
  • Share in the comments your highest wave!!!

GameDevs:

Audio <3 - Ángel de Luz Ipenza Echeverría [Miss miau]

Everything else xD - Luis Fernando Frontanilla Gutierrez [Groxar]
